info.name: Google Customiser with slideshow background
info.description:
Adds many customisation options and an animated background to your Google Search. For 6 images, smooth slideshow animation (using CSS3 keyframes). Customisation options:
  • Change the different background slides
  • Duration for slideshow in seconds
  • Change the colour and transparency of the footer and its links
  • Change the colour and transparency of the search bar and search buttons
  • Hide/Show the voice search icon
  • Hide/Show the country name below the Google logo
  • Change the colour of the Gmail and Google image search links
  • Change the colour of the alert button's background
  • Enable/Disable changing the alert symbol's size to fit the other buttons
  • Enable/Disable adding a circle around the "Google apps" button to make it better visible and to fit the other buttons (circle colour is changeable, too)
  • Adds a customizable hover effect to the user avatar and alert button
info.additionalInfo:
Should work on all country's sites. Notice 1: Looks better when all images are in the same aspect ratio. Notice 2: Looks best with dark images. All example images are from https://pixabay.com/ Image List:

Imgur gallery with all these images (cropped to fit the window perfectly): http://imgur.com/a/txfCR Changelog: Version 1.0: First release Version 1.1: Added hover effects to the alerts button and user avatar (customizable) (What that looks like: GIF) Version 1.2: Added the ability to hide the ugly border around the search buttons Bugs? A feature request? Go to my profile and send me either an email or a private message.
